params.expirationTime: The expiration time of the attestation.
params.r: The x-coordinate of the nonce R.

getDomainSeparator().details: Returns the domain separator used in the encoding of the signatures for attest, and revoke.

devdoc.title: EIP712 typed signatures verifier for EAS delegated attestations.

getAttestTypeHash().notice: Returns the EIP712 type hash for the attest function.

getRevokeTypeHash().notice: Returns the EIP712 type hash for the revoke function.
